Legislative and regulatory activity impacting the banking industry including: S.2860, Secure and Fair Enforcement Regulation (SAFER) Banking Act; S.1323/H.R.2891, Secure and Fair Enforcement (SAFE) Banking Act of 2023; S.1838/H.R.3881, Credit Card Competition Act of 2023; data privacy, bank regulatory oversight, and executive compensation issues; Federal Reserve Regulation II (Debit Card Interchange Fees and Routing).

Legislative and regulatory activity impacting the banking industry including: S.2860, Secure and Fair Enforcement Regulation (SAFER) Banking Act; S.1323/H.R.2891, Secure and Fair Enforcement (SAFE) Banking Act of 2023; S.1838/H.R.3881, Credit Card Competition Act of 2023; data privacy, bank regulatory oversight, and executive compensation issues; Federal Reserve Regulation II (Debit Card Interchange Fees and Routing); H.R.8818, American Privacy Rights Act of 2024.
Legislative and regulatory activity impacting the banking industry including H.R.1822, ACRE Act of 2025.

Legislative and regulatory activity impacting the banking industry including: FY2026 National Defense Authorization Act (S.2296), prohibition of Fed interest payments on reserve deposits; Discussion draft of the Responsible Financial Innovation Act of 2025 (RFIA), digital asset market structure.
